name: Smart TV
description: Experience stunning visuals with our 4K Smart TV. Stream your favorite shows and movies seamlessly.

name: Laptop
description: Powerful and portable. This laptop is perfect for work and entertainment on the go.

name: Smartphone
description: Stay connected with our latest smartphone. Capture amazing photos and enjoy fast performance.

name: Wireless Earbuds
description: Immerse yourself in high-quality sound with our wireless earbuds. Perfect for on-the-go audio.

name: Robot Vacuum Cleaner
description: Keep your home clean effortlessly with our smart robot vacuum cleaner. Schedule cleanings from your phone.

name: Smart Thermostat
description: Save energy and control your home's temperature with our smart thermostat. Easy to use and eco-friendly.

name: Electric Blender
description: Create delicious smoothies and shakes with our powerful electric blender. Easy to clean and durable.

name: Gaming Console
description: Experience immersive gaming with our latest gaming console. High-quality graphics and a vast game library.

name: Digital Camera
description: Capture stunning moments with our high-resolution digital camera. Perfect for photography enthusiasts.

name: Smart Doorbell
description: Enhance your home security with our smart doorbell. Receive alerts and see who's at your door from your phone.

name: Electric Toothbrush
description: Maintain oral health with our advanced electric toothbrush. Gentle on gums and effective in cleaning.

name: Smart Lighting Kit
description: Transform your home with our smart lighting kit. Control colors and intensity with your smartphone.

name: Portable Power Bank
description: Stay charged on the go with our portable power bank. Compact and powerful for all your devices.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Charge your devices wirelessly with our sleek charging pad. Compatible with a variety of devices.

name: Smartwatch
description: Track your fitness and stay connected with our feature-packed smartwatch. Stylish and functional.

name: Electric Kettle
description: Boil water quickly and efficiently with our electric kettle. Perfect for tea and coffee enthusiasts.

name: Smart Refrigerator
description: Keep your food fresh and organized with our smart refrigerator. Monitor contents from your phone.

name: Electric Fan
description: Stay cool in the summer heat with our powerful electric fan. Adjustable settings for comfort.

name: Smart Coffee Maker
description: Brew your favorite coffee with our smart coffee maker. Set brewing preferences from your phone.

name: Electric Shaver
description: Achieve a smooth shave with our advanced electric shaver. Gentle on the skin with precision blades.
